downloadTitle: Bank Reconciliation in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Bank Reconciliation module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Bank Reconciliation module in Microsoft Dynamics SL. At Training Material Completion After reviewing this training, individuals will have:
  • Provide you with a solid understanding of the Bank Reconciliation module including setup, account maintenance, module transaction import, bank file import and the reconciliation process.
  • Provide you with an understanding of how the transaction cycle coincides with the accounting cycle along with the ability to complete the accounting cycle.
Prerequisites Before reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • General knowledge of Microsoft Windows
  • Knowledge of basic navigation functions in Microsoft Dynamics SL.
  • General Ledger training course.
​
